newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Raster Graphics started.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Raster Graphics started.

text.p: -- Prudential Securities analyst Alex Henderson said he initiated coverage of Raster Graphics Inc with a buy rating.
-- estimated earnings of $0.25 per share pro forma for 1996, and $0.55 for 1997.
-- said the production wide-format color printing company is gaining market share, has a strong product portfolio and is well run.
-- set price target of $13 for six to 12 months, and $15 for 12 to 18 months.
-- Shares closed up 1/4 to 11-1/4 on Tuesday.
